law.catch_line: The following are obligations of the State:...

text.section: Subject to § 21-316 of this subtitle, the assets of the several systems shall be used to pay the obligations of the State specified in this section.

Each fiscal year the State shall pay to the accumulation fund of each State system at least an amount that when combined with the amount in the accumulation fund of the system is sufficient to provide the allowances and other benefits payable out of the fund during that fiscal year.
